about_p_1: Welcome to our hotel, the perfect getaway for families seeking comfort and adventure. Surrounded by lush greenery, our hotel features an equestrian club where guests can enjoy the beauty of horses up close. Relax in our cozy rooms, open 24/7 reception, and indulge at our late-hour bar and restaurant.
